name: Nano Assault
description:
Control your microscopic Nanite ship inside the dangerous virus to fight off infections, navigate through alien cell clusters, battle bosses, and ultimately analyze and destroy the virus’ core to save humanity.

Features

• Find, analyze, and destroy the virus with your Nanite vessel.
• Harness the power of multiple weapons like homing beams & bombs.
• Blast your way through 32 twisted cell stages and dark worlds.
